Text: RE MFN Liens ECS financing Cc Mark As per our Original Message From Jameson Lance Sent Wednesday August AM To Dziadek Keith Bucknell Martin Castrejana Pete Imam Hasan Cc Rub Jenny Bulgawicz Susan Subject RE MFN Liens ECS financing Sensitivity Confidential Yes it is related to ECS The company is RHC Enterprise Rob Christian Although we dont know that the entire MM relates to us Original Message From Dziadek Keith Sent Wednesday August AM To Jameson Lance Bucknell Martin Castrejana Pete Imam Hasan Cc Rub Jenny Bulgawicz Susan Subject RE MFN Liens ECS financing Sensitivity Confidential What is the second hand info on the MM lien Is it related to ECS Original Message From Jameson Lance Sent Wednesday August AM To Bucknell Martin Castrejana Pete Imam Hasan Dziadek Keith Cc Rub Jenny Bulgawicz Susan Subject MFN Liens ECS financing Importance High Sensitivity Confidential EPSC advised that we have received notice that an lien will be filed by Fisk Electric against MFN for work relating to ECS Further we have second hand information inside our team that indicates a second company may file a MM lien against MFN It is imperative that we resolve this issue Building financing cannot be closed with any liens outstanding Because we have benefited from Fisks and any other contractors efforts in ECS contracted for by MFN should MFN fail to resolve liens against them we will be required to clear the liens on their behalf in order to obtain financing While the second lien is hearsay at this point we should reassess our risk analysis regarding our strategy of relying solely on MFN I have recommended to Hasan and Pete that we run an DB and a credit check These services can be obtained through GSS I can coordinate if needed
